summary: Represents a Bose SoundTouch speaker, providing properties and actions to manage its configuration, playback (play, pause, next, previous), volume (set, up, down, mute), power state, and multi‑room zone membership.
business_intent: Allow software (e.g., home‑automation platforms) to control and monitor Bose SoundTouch devices, enabling automated media playback, volume adjustments, and zone grouping across rooms.
